        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>promethean</catalog>
            <entry>9968</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-US">Egg-citing Adventures</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">Chickens aren't the only ones who lay eggs. Through poetry and hands-on activities, students learn how birds, reptiles, fish, and amphibians are alike and different. Number activities and videos are integrated into the lesson.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="en-US">oviparous</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en-US">animal classification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">easter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
        </general>
